item.description:
Portland Museum of Art

Here are the detail about the exhibits that will be there during this time!


Division and Discovery: Recent Work by Frederick Lynch
February 27, 2010 - July 11, 2010

As an abstract painter, Maine artist Frederick Lynch (born 1935) uses a system of repeated geometries and mathematical divisions to explore a multitude of visual possibilities. His paintings evoke the type of order and chaos found in patterns of natureâ€”branching, veining of leaves, and molecular systems. This exhibition of 25 recent works by Lynch will pair his large painted canvases with smaller sections of each of his paintings.
